metadata.description: VM0 SaaS integration skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: ai-services
plugins.description: AI and machine learning APIs including LLMs, image generation, video generation, and speech synthesis

plugins.name: communication
plugins.description: Messaging, email, and notification services including Slack, Discord, Gmail, and push notifications

plugins.name: crm-sales
plugins.description: CRM and sales automation tools including customer support, email outreach, and pipeline management

plugins.name: developer-tools
plugins.description: Developer productivity tools including version control, issue tracking, and error monitoring

plugins.name: data-storage
plugins.description: Database, analytics, and storage services including vector databases, object storage, and observability

plugins.name: document-processing
plugins.description: Document processing and PDF manipulation APIs

plugins.name: media-content
plugins.description: Media hosting, image generation, and content management services

plugins.name: web-scraping
plugins.description: Web scraping, crawling, and data extraction services

plugins.name: social-publishing
plugins.description: Social media and developer blogging platforms

plugins.name: utilities
plugins.description: Utility services including scheduling, URL shortening, e-signatures, and RSS feeds
